Package com.stats

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorpusSize
    count number of words in a text file and return the value as the corpus size in words
    FileToArrayReader
    Reading a text file into an array of strings.
    LlhCalculator
    calculates log likelihood between a source and a reference corpus for more details on LLH please visit: http://ucrel.lancs.ac.uk/llwizard.html
    MainCLI
    Main CLI application to run the code (you don't actually need to use this if you know your way with Java) check the TestJavaWordClouds class for more details.
    ReadCSV  
    ResultsCsvSaver
    Create CSV files to save the results of the frequency and LLH values.
    RotatedLabel
    A label, that can be rotated by 90 degrees either left or right.
    TestJavaWordClouds
    Test class to make two word clouds using a soruce, a reference and a keywords text files.
    ValidateIntegers
    simple integer validator
    WordCloudMaker
    create java word clouds maker using two arrays (first column containing keywords, second containing size (freq or LLH).
    WordFrequencyCounter
    Count word frequency and input text file size in words
    WordStats  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RotatedLabel.Direction
    Represents the direction of a rotated label.
